original_title: 本当にあった怨霊恐怖動画18
overview: The 18th horror documentary released by the staff of the "Real Vengeful Ghost Horror Video" series. Includes all 8 posted videos that have been released in preparation for cursed death. Here is the most terrifying message from the evil spirit who left this world leaving a strong grudge that the daily video accidentally captured.
title: Real Vengeful Ghost Horror Video 18
